author: sudhaahuja
body:
Removed StackedTrackerGeomtery. Uses new dataformats.
Produces stubs with TrackerGeometry and TrackerTopology.
Modified the TTCluster and TTStubs classes - respective producers , algorithms for each.
TTCluster, TTStub, TTTrack use the Phase2TrackerDigi's instead of PixelDigi's.
title: Trigger primitives - fixed the TTClusters & TTStubs
